ContentStyles.Name: Informative News
ContentStyles.Description: Adopt a balanced, journalistic tone. Focus on clarity, factual accuracy, and presenting key information concisely.

ContentStyles.Name: Comedy / Entertaining
ContentStyles.Description: Inject humor, witty banter, and playful disagreements. Use exaggeration and amusing analogies.

ContentStyles.Name: Educational / Explainer
ContentStyles.Description: Break down complex topics into simple, understandable segments. Use analogies and real-world examples.

ContentStyles.Name: Motivational / Inspiring
ContentStyles.Description: Use powerful, uplifting language. Build towards an inspiring conclusion. Share personal anecdotes.

ContentStyles.Name: Casual Conversational
ContentStyles.Description: Create a relaxed, 'friends chatting' vibe. The dialogue should be natural, with slang and overlapping thoughts.

ContentStyles.Name: Serious Debate
ContentStyles.Description: Construct a structured argument with clear points and counterpoints. The tone should be formal and persuasive.

ContentStyles.Name: Story Mode
ContentStyles.Description: Narrate a compelling story. Use descriptive language to build atmosphere and suspense.

ContentStyles.Name: Documentary
ContentStyles.Description: Follow a formal, narrative structure. Act as a narrator guiding the listener with clarity and authority.

ContentStyles.Name: ASMR
ContentStyles.Description: Focus on soft, gentle, and relaxing words. Emphasize crisp consonant sounds and create a calming atmosphere.
